description: Knights League, a WeChat group that serves as an informal union for Chinese food delivery platform workers, was founded in 2018. They share news and information with each other.
author: wynniechan
addresses: 順豐速運 SF Express, 414, 太子道西 Prince Edward Road West, 珓杯石 Kau Pui Shek, 九龍城 Kowloon City, 九龍城區 Kowloon City District, 九龍 Kowloon, 香港 Hong Kong, 中国
